item.title: Gun Violence Claims
item.description: In my youth, I enjoyed the occasional use of marijuana which I prefer to call “the cannabis plant” or simply “cannabis”. I consider this plant to be one of the most sacred plants on Earth. But that plant is illegal to grow, sell, and consume in many places. I live in such a place: Alabama. And I abstain from doing illegal activities because I don’t want law enforcers to steal my children from me.
